data.title: The Royal Family
data.meta_description: Read stories about #britain, #love, and #beautiful on Wattpad, recommended by briibriihh718
data.text:
House of Windsor

Dayna is just a normal girl with a big like for the royal family. But what happens when she bumps into someone special on the street?

Completed

Married to a Prince

Two years of being kept in the dark as the Prince's wife... What happens when all of a sudden The Royal Palace wants Anna and Harry to go public? P.S i don't have any knowledge about the Britains (nor about the Royals, i just google some info), this is just an idea. I don't intend to offend some brits :)

Mature

The Youngest Royal

Meet Matilda Elizabeth Anna Diana the youngest child and only daughter of Prince Charles and Princess Diana. She is 4 years younger than William and 1 year younger than Harry. The three siblings are very close and wreck havoc to the Palace. The story will start when she is only 11 years old, the year of her mother's d...

MY KIND OF PERFECT ‚èõ british royal family faniction

After much speculation in the national media, Princess Victoria finally confirmed the rumors about her long-time relationship with American actor Chris Evans. Now, the news of their much-anticipated wedding has the world paying attention to the royal family like never before.

Violet | British Royal Family|

What if Princess Diana and Prince Charles had married a year earlier and had another son? The Heir, Prince Nicholas of Wales. Nicholas is one year older than his brother William and three years older than his brother Harry, which makes him the heir to the british throne after his grandmother and father are deceased. H...

Mature

The bodyguard

Princess Ella Elizabeth Windsor. Princess of Buckingham palace. Sometimes she loves being a princess but sometimes she hates it. She soon starts loving it when she gets assigned a hot body guard that has to follow her around 24/7. Sometimes she likes him. Sometimes she hates him.What will happen when she slowly starts...

Completed Mature

The Windsors (OLD VERSION)

Prince James Alexander is Prince William's twin brother who was born 20 minutes before him, making James the second in line to the throne. Eleanor Isabella is a socialite from New York. Both went to Oxford University and both met the love of their lives there. It's been 9 years since they both became the Duke and Du...

Completed

Forever My Always

When Alexa Grey's best friend, the Princess Eugenie of York, becomes engaged to her long time boyfriend Jack, Alexa is asked to become Eugenie's maid of honour. Little did she know that along the way of learning the ropes of becoming a member of a royal wedding party would also bring her to meet a certain prince, Prin...

Mature

The Life of Victoria

A British Royal Family Fanfiction The World tend to forget about the girl hiding behind her mother's skirt during state visits. Victoria Wales is a woman of her own talents. Born with a brilliant mind, she sets off on a different path than that of her brothers. Rather than being in the public eye, Victoria was inside...

A Royal Marriage

Isla Richards has been through a lot! She is the Duchess of Sussex and striving to be a perfect mother, wife, and Duchess. She wants the world to see that not all royals are stuck up. What If?

What if not Prince William was the heir to the throne, but Prince Charles and Princess Diana had another first born. Meet Prince Alexander Edward Louis Philip of Wales. Prince William, the Prince of Wales gets a second chance at love with the woman who's always been there. The Prince of Wales is suffering from a broken heart. After losing his wife and future queen, he knows he'll never find love again with a partner as wonderful as her. He's thrown himself into his duties and is tryi...

What if one prince comes into her work and she gets formally invited to a Football game charity event And he's the captain of her team. Maybe he might show an interest in her and she doesn't in him.
